Sylph::Core::Object

#include <Sylph/Core/Object.h>

Detailed Description

The root of all classes.

This class contains the overloaded new and delete operators. All classes in LibSylph extend from this class. If you want your class to communicate with LibSylph, or just if you want to let LibSylph's garbage collector manage dynamic allocation of your class, you should derive from Object.
